about_the_game:
Includes the A.R.E.S: Extinction Agenda Original Soundtrack with music by Christopher Geehan & Daniel Byrne-McCullough of HyperDuck SoundWorks. It is in MP3 format, featuring three bonus tracks not heard in the game. This album boasts adjusted mixes with High Quality renditions of every track on the Original Soundtrack.

Track List:

  1. Title Theme
  2. 30th May, 2094
  3. Junkyard
  4. Fire in the Sky
  5. Goliath & Carrion
  6. Bombs N' Guns
  7. And It's Done
  8. Remake
  9. Home of the Calumma
  10. Snappin' Necks & Cashin' Cheques
  11. Sentinel & Prime Guardian
  12. Julia Carson
  13. Electrigger Happy
  14. Zytron
  15. UE
  16. Beautiful Savage
  17. The Subtle Knife
  18. Evil Runs in the Family
  19. Bang Bang Bang!
  20. Grass is Always Greener

Songs will be placed in your A.R.E.S. folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\A.R.E.S.\Soundtrack

name: A.R.E.S.: Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Microsoft Windows XP, Windows Vista or Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core™2 Duo Processor, AMD Athlon x2 Processor
  • Memory: Windows XP：1GB, Windows Vista, 7：2GB
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7600 series, ATI Radeon HD 2400 series
  • DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 300 MB
  • Sound: DirectSound compatible (DirectX 9.0c or higher)
